NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to calculate accurate prayer times based on your current city.
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need your location to calculate accurate prayer times and send notifications even when the app is in the background.
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need your location to provide accurate prayer times notifications based on your position.
NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app does not use the microphone.
NSCameraUsageDescription: This app does not use the camera.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app does not use your photo library.
